doc:
Toni Basil https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toni_Basil 0 Antonia Christina Basilotta (born September 22, 1943), better known by her stage name Toni Basil, is an American singer, actress, choreographer, dancer, and filmmaker, best known for her multi-million-selling worldwide 1982 hit "Mickey", which reached No 1 in several countries. Antonia_Christina_Basilotta ( born September_22_,_1943 ) , better_known by her_stage_name_Toni_Basil , is an_American_singer , actress , choreographer , dancer , and filmmaker , best_known for her_multi-million-selling_worldwide_1982_hit_"_Mickey_" , which reached No_1 in several_countries .
